job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: <p><strong><u>Software Engineer</u></strong> required by a Digital Platform Company working on cutting edge projects such as Next-gen Mobility &amp; Autonomous Automation. Their goal is to help the world’s most ambitious companies build digital platforms and thriving ecosystems.</p><p><br></p><p>They are looking for a Software Engineer (Java) to join their team. (Fully remote option with offices in NYC, LA, Detroit, etc.)</p><p><br></p><p><strong><u>The role:</u></strong></p><ul><li>3+years’ experience with Java and Spring</li><li>Experience with AWS or GCP</li><li>Experience with Devops and CI/CD tools, a plus</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong><u>Compensation:</u></strong></p><ul><li>Up to $170,000 plus 10% bonus</li></ul><p><br></p><p><br></p><p>If this Software Engineer Positon could be of interest please apply through this advert, or send a copy of your Resume to C.Gregoire@x4technology.us</p>
